HomePage.title: Circle Crop Image
HomePage.description: Free online round photo cropper – create perfect circular images in seconds.

hero.title: Crop any image into a perfect circle in seconds
hero.description: Circle Crop Image is a free online tool to transform rectangular photos into clean, circular images with transparent backgrounds – perfect for avatars, social media, and design projects.

toolSection.label: Circle Crop Image Tool
toolSection.title: Create perfect circular images in seconds
toolSection.description: Upload a picture, fine‑tune the zoom level, and download a crisp circular PNG image with transparent background in just a few seconds — no signup, no watermark.

item-1.title: Instant Processing
item-1.description: Upload your image and get a perfect circular crop in seconds. No waiting, no delays - just fast, reliable image processing.

item-2.title: Privacy First
item-2.description: All processing happens in your browser. Your images never leave your device - complete privacy and security guaranteed.

item-3.title: High Quality Output
item-3.description: Download crisp, high-resolution PNG images with transparent backgrounds. Perfect for avatars, social media, and professional use.

item-4.title: Easy to Use
item-4.description: No technical skills required. Simply upload, adjust zoom, and download. It's that simple - anyone can create perfect circles.

item-1.question: Is Circle Crop Image free to use?
item-1.answer: Yes, Circle Crop Image is completely free to use. No signup required, no hidden fees, and no watermarks on your images.

item-2.question: Do my images get uploaded to a server?
item-2.answer: No, all image processing happens entirely in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy and security.

item-3.question: What image formats are supported?
item-3.answer: We support all common image formats including JPG, PNG, GIF, and WebP. The output is always a high-quality PNG with transparent background.

item-4.question: Can I use the cropped images commercially?
item-4.answer: Yes, you own all rights to the images you create. Use them for personal projects, social media, or commercial purposes - it's completely up to you.

item-5.question: What's the maximum image size I can upload?
item-5.answer: You can upload images up to 10MB in size. For best results, we recommend images between 500x500 and 2000x2000 pixels.

item-1.name: Sarah Chen
item-1.quote: Circle Crop Image is a game-changer for my social media workflow. I can create perfect profile pictures in seconds without any design skills.

item-2.name: Michael Rodriguez
item-2.quote: The privacy aspect is amazing - knowing my images never leave my browser gives me complete peace of mind. Plus, the quality is outstanding.

item-3.name: Emily Johnson
item-3.quote: I use Circle Crop Image daily for my blog and social media. It's fast, free, and produces professional-quality results every time.

item-4.name: David Kim
item-4.quote: Perfect for creating team avatars and profile pictures. The zoom control lets me get exactly the crop I want. Highly recommended!

item-5.name: Lisa Wang
item-5.quote: As a photographer, I appreciate the high-quality output. The transparent background PNGs are perfect for my portfolio website.

item-6.name: James Taylor
item-6.quote: No signup, no hassle, just upload and download. This is exactly what I needed for my business profile pictures. Simple and effective!

item-7.name: Maria Garcia
item-7.quote: The browser-based processing is brilliant. I can use it on any device, anywhere, without installing anything. Perfect for quick edits on the go.

item-8.name: Robert Brown
item-8.quote: I love that it's completely free with no watermarks. The quality is professional-grade, and it works flawlessly every time.

item-9.name: Jennifer Lee
item-9.quote: Creating circular images for my blog has never been easier. The interface is intuitive, and the results are always perfect.

item-10.name: Thomas Anderson
item-10.quote: Best free tool I've found for circular image cropping. Fast, reliable, and produces high-quality results. What more could you ask for?

item-11.name: Amanda White
item-11.quote: Perfect for product images and team photos. The transparent background feature is exactly what I needed for my online store.

item-12.name: Christopher Martinez
item-12.quote: I use this tool for all my client projects. It's professional, fast, and completely free. My clients love the results!

heading.title: Circle Crop Image – Perfect Round Photos in Seconds
heading.description: Upload any picture, adjust the zoom, and download a high-quality circular PNG image with transparent background. All processing happens instantly in your browser.

upload.label: Upload image
upload.description: Supports JPG / PNG / WEBP / GIF. All images are downloaded as PNG with transparent background. Images are processed locally in your browser and never leave your device.

preview.placeholder: Upload an image to see a live circular preview here.
